::frontendgen.expansion: Generates a full front-end scaffold using React/Vite/Tailwind/Shadcn UI/Motion with proper component structure, responsive design, accessibility checks and styling best practices.

::frontendgen-layout.expansion: Designs grid layouts using patterns such as cinematic Z, modular cockpit, F-pattern or gallery spotlight to organise the UI.

::frontendgen-state.expansion: Sets up state management (Context API or Redux) and data flow for components, ensuring unidirectional data and predictable updates.

::frontendgen-forms.expansion: Creates form components with validation, error handling and user friendly UX guidelines.

::frontendgen-access.expansion: Performs accessibility audits including contrast ratio checks, ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation.

::frontendgen-motion.expansion: Integrates Framer Motion to add subtle animations following motion grammar for natural interactions.

::frontendgen-tests.expansion: Generates front-end unit tests using React Testing Library with high coverage.

::frontendgen-docs.expansion: Produces UI documentation with Storybook or equivalent to showcase components and usage.

::backendgen.expansion: Creates a robust RESTful API scaffold using FastAPI (or chosen framework), including database connection, models and security primitives.

::backendgen-api.expansion: Scaffolds CRUD endpoints with pagination and filtering on the chosen framework.

::backendgen-auth.expansion: Implements authentication and authorization mechanisms (JWT or OAuth2).

::backendgen-models.expansion: Defines ORM models and Pydantic schemas based on the database schema.

::backendgen-security.expansion: Adds security measures such as input sanitization, CSRF protection and rate limiting.

::backendgen-migrations.expansion: Creates database migration scripts to manage schema evolution (Alembic or equivalent).

::backendgen-logging.expansion: Sets up structured logging and monitoring hooks to trace API behaviour and performance.

::backendgen-tests.expansion: Generates API unit and integration tests to ensure endpoint correctness and error handling.

::backendgen-docs.expansion: Auto-generates API documentation (OpenAPI/Swagger) and example usages.

::dbdesign.expansion: Designs a database schema (relational or NoSQL) from business requirements.

::dbdesign-schema.expansion: Produces entity–relationship diagrams and table/collection definitions with keys and constraints.

::dbdesign-normalize.expansion: Normalises the schema to third normal form while balancing denormalization for performance.

::dbdesign-index.expansion: Suggests indexes and partitioning strategies to optimise query performance.

::dbdesign-seed.expansion: Generates seed data aligned with schema definitions for development and testing.

::dbdesign-migrate.expansion: Writes migration scripts to evolve the database schema safely across versions.

::apidocgen.expansion: Generates comprehensive API documentation including endpoints, request/response examples and error codes.

::apidocgen-swagger.expansion: Creates an OpenAPI/Swagger specification for the API.

::apidocgen-code.expansion: Provides example code snippets (curl, Python, JS) demonstrating API usage.

::apidocgen-errors.expansion: Documents standardised error codes and messages with causes and solutions.

::apidocgen-tests.expansion: Creates tests to validate that the API documentation matches the actual implementation.

::testgen.expansion: Constructs a suite of tests across units, integrations, end-to-end scenarios, coverage analysis and performance.

::testgen-unit.expansion: Generates unit tests for individual functions or modules, covering nominal and edge cases.

::testgen-integration.expansion: Produces integration tests to verify interactions between components and external services.

::testgen-e2e.expansion: Creates end-to-end tests with headless browsers or API calls to simulate real user flows.

::testgen-coverage.expansion: Measures code coverage and identifies untested paths.

::testgen-performance.expansion: Implements performance stress tests and benchmarks to assess throughput and latency.

::testgen-security.expansion: Creates security tests to check for vulnerabilities such as injection, authentication bypass and misconfigurations.

::cicdsetup.expansion: Sets up continuous integration and deployment pipelines with linting, testing, building, deployment and monitoring stages.

::cicd-lint.expansion: Runs linting tools (ESLint, PEP8, Prettier) and applies automatic fixes to formatting issues.

::cicd-test.expansion: Executes unit, integration and end-to-end tests during the pipeline.

::cicd-build.expansion: Builds and bundles the application (e.g., Webpack/Vite bundling or Docker image creation).

::cicd-deploy.expansion: Deploys the application to the target environment (Docker, Render, Kubernetes) and performs environment configuration.

::cicd-monitor.expansion: Monitors deployed applications with health checks and alerts to detect failures or performance degradations.

::cicd-notify.expansion: Sends notifications (Slack, email) about pipeline status and deployment outcomes.

::cicd-rollback.expansion: Provides automated rollback procedures when deployments fail or regress.

::lintfix.expansion: Applies linting and formatting rules to all project files and reports violations.

::securityaudit.expansion: Runs a comprehensive security audit, scanning source code, dependencies and configurations for vulnerabilities and ethics issues.

::security-static.expansion: Performs static analysis (SAST) to detect vulnerabilities such as SQL injection or XSS.

::security-deps.expansion: Scans dependencies for known CVEs and insecure versions.

::security-injection.expansion: Identifies injection vulnerabilities in code paths accepting external input.

::security-authz.expansion: Audits roles, permissions and secrets management for proper authorization enforcement.

::security-report.expansion: Generates a risk report with severity scores and remediation advice.

::security-fairness.expansion: Assesses algorithmic bias and fairness metrics across demographic groups.

::security-ethics.expansion: Evaluates ethical compliance including privacy, diversity and inclusion considerations.

::perfprofile.expansion: Profiles code performance (CPU, memory, I/O, network) and recommends optimisations.

::perf-cpu.expansion: Measures CPU usage and identifies hot spots in the code.

::perf-memory.expansion: Analyzes memory allocations and detects leaks.

::perf-io.expansion: Profiles disk and network I/O patterns to detect bottlenecks.

::perf-network.expansion: Measures network latency, throughput and concurrency for API endpoints.

::perf-benchmark.expansion: Provides comparative benchmarks across different implementations or configurations.

::coderefactor.expansion: Refactors code to improve maintainability and architecture using design patterns and modularisation.

::refactor-smells.expansion: Detects and resolves code smells such as duplication, large methods and long parameter lists.

::refactor-patterns.expansion: Suggests design patterns and architecture improvements to enhance flexibility and extensibility.

::refactor-modular.expansion: Splits monoliths into modular components and services.

::refactor-complexity.expansion: Reduces cyclomatic complexity by simplifying logic and improving cohesion.

::refactor-docs.expansion: Updates docstrings and comments to reflect refactored code structure.

::codequality.expansion: Evaluates code readability, maintainability, architecture and adherence to standards.

::codequality-read.expansion: Assesses variable naming, code clarity and documentation quality.

::codequality-maintain.expansion: Identifies maintainability issues such as tight coupling and poor separation of concerns.

::codequality-architecture.expansion: Evaluates overall architecture coherence and alignment with best practices.

::codequality-standards.expansion: Ensures adherence to organisational coding standards and style guides.

::typegen.expansion: Generates type definitions and schemas (Pydantic, TypeScript, JSON Schema, Protobuf, ORM models) from data samples or schemas.

::typegen-pydantic.expansion: Creates Pydantic models from JSON or Python dictionaries.

::typegen-ts.expansion: Generates TypeScript interfaces from API responses or schemas.

::typegen-jsonschema.expansion: Produces JSON Schema definitions for data validation and documentation.

::typegen-proto.expansion: Creates Protocol Buffer definitions for gRPC services.

::typegen-orm.expansion: Generates ORM models (SQLAlchemy, TypeORM) based on schema definitions.

::mockdata.expansion: Generates realistic test data for development, testing and demonstration purposes.

::mockdata-sample.expansion: Creates standard dummy data consistent with given types and constraints.

::mockdata-distrib.expansion: Samples data from statistical distributions to mimic real-world values.

::mockdata-edge.expansion: Produces edge-case data to test boundary conditions.

::mockdata-sensitive.expansion: Generates anonymised versions of sensitive data to preserve privacy while testing.

::deployscript.expansion: Creates deployment scripts and configuration for various environments (Docker, Kubernetes, Render).

::deploy-docker.expansion: Generates Dockerfile and docker-compose configurations with best practices.

::deploy-env.expansion: Creates environment variable templates and secrets management guidelines.

::deploy-scaling.expansion: Produces configuration for autoscaling clusters (Kubernetes, Render) with resource limits and health probes.

::deploy-monitor.expansion: Integrates logging and monitoring agents for observability after deployment.

::uiuxaudit.expansion: Conducts UI/UX audits covering colour harmony, typography, layout, motion and emotional resonance.

::uiux-color.expansion: Checks colour palettes for harmony and sufficient contrast ratios.

::uiux-typography.expansion: Evaluates typography flow, font choices and legibility across devices.

::uiux-layout.expansion: Analyzes spatial rhythm, grid balance and alignment.

::uiux-motion.expansion: Assesses animation usage for naturalness, timing and context.

::uiux-emotion.expansion: Reviews emotional tone and resonance of the user interface.

::analyticsinject.expansion: Inserts analytics instrumentation with probabilistic sampling for event tracking and performance metrics.

::analytics-events.expansion: Tracks page views, clicks and custom events across the application.

::analytics-performance.expansion: Measures load times, rendering performance and resource usage for analytics.

::analytics-userflow.expansion: Collects funnel and conversion metrics to understand user behaviour.

::analytics-abtest.expansion: Creates instrumentation for A/B testing of variants and features.

::erroranalysis.expansion: Parses logs and diagnostics to identify root causes of errors and suggest fixes.

::error-logparser.expansion: Parses application logs and extracts error events, stack traces and context.

::error-rootcause.expansion: Identifies the root cause of errors by analysing call stacks and dependencies.

::error-fixsuggest.expansion: Suggests code changes or configuration adjustments to fix identified issues.

::error-reproduce.expansion: Generates reproducible test cases to trigger the observed error.

::error-report.expansion: Summarizes the error analysis in a clear report for developers and stakeholders.

::integrationtest.expansion: Builds automated integration test scripts for third-party APIs and services.

::integration-setup.expansion: Sets up the testing environment and any required test data for integration tests.

::integration-call.expansion: Sends requests to APIs and services with various payloads during integration tests.

::integration-validate.expansion: Validates responses and side effects from integration tests against expected outcomes.

::integration-teardown.expansion: Cleans up the environment after integration tests are executed.

::fulldeveloper.expansion: Orchestrates the rapid creation of an end-to-end prototype by combining front-end, back-end, database, testing and deployment tasks.

::prototype-scaffold.expansion: Quickly builds a working UI, API and database skeleton for prototyping.

::prototype-tests.expansion: Sets up a minimal testing harness for the prototype to ensure basic functionality.

::prototype-deploy.expansion: Packages the prototype for deployment, creating necessary scripts and configuration.

::prototype-docs.expansion: Generates basic documentation describing the prototype’s architecture and usage.

::frontendsuite.expansion: Executes all front-end related macros including layout, state, forms, access, motion, tests and docs.

::backendsuite.expansion: Runs back-end scaffolding, DB design and API documentation macros.

::testsuite.expansion: Executes unit, integration, end-to-end, coverage, performance, security and error analysis macros.

::cicdsuite.expansion: Runs the CI/CD setup including linting, testing, building, deploying, monitoring and notifications, along with security and performance profiling.

::securesuite.expansion: Combines security analysis, fairness and ethical review macros.

::optimizsuite.expansion: Runs performance profiling, refactoring and code quality evaluation macros.

::deploysuite.expansion: Generates deployment scripts and configures scaling and monitoring.

::datasuite.expansion: Generates data schemas, type definitions and mock data.

::uxsuite.expansion: Performs a UI/UX audit and injects analytics instrumentation for better product insights.

::fullstacksuite.expansion: Builds a cohesive stack by orchestrating front-end, back-end, testing, CI/CD and deployment macros.

::masterdev.expansion: Coordinates the entire macro system by constructing belief structures, calibrating uncertainty and executing all relevant suites to produce a complete production-grade software package with ethical, secure and performant characteristics.
